page.title: 19Silverdale Cricket Club
page.content:
In 1986 Silverdale Cricket club had just one team, and we played on the Institute Field, in the middle of the village, behind the fire station, and affectionately known as the postage stamp. Now in 2011 we run two senior teams and three junior teams on our new ground at Cove Road, which boasts a super pavilion and excellent ground facilities.We moved there in 2001, with just a field, and changing facilities provided by the Leeds Children's Home, based next door,
Contribution by: Mike Moon
